title: R Workshop 2023
text:
Omics Data Handling and Visualization in R
17 May 2023
Faculty of Science, Prince of Songkla University

Basic R programming for intermediate learner
Exploratory data analysis
Omics data handling with Tidyverse bundle
Learn graphical requirements for publications
Generating publication-quality plots






Figure adapted from @storyset. Designed by Freepik. Find more R hex stickers at RStudio hex stickers.
